billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Relates to the sale of certain tickets to theatres or places of amusement or entertainment
summary: Prohibits the sale of tickets to theaters or places of amusement or entertainment where such tickets are available to the public at no charge; violations shall be punishable by $100 fine.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2259

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Cultural Affairs, Tourism,
         Parks and Recreation

       AN ACT to amend the arts  and  cultural  affairs  law,  in  relation  to
         prohibiting  the  sale of certain tickets of admission to theatres, or
         places of amusement or entertainment

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  arts and cultural affairs law is amended by adding a
    2  new section 25.10 to read as follows:
    3    S 25.10. UNLAWFUL SALE OF CERTAIN TICKETS.  NO  PERSON,  FIRM,  CORPO-
    4  RATION  OR  NOT-FOR-PROFIT  ORGANIZATION  SHALL  SELL,  OFFER TO SELL OR
    5  SOLICIT THE SALE OF ANY TICKET OR OTHER EVIDENCE OF RIGHT OF ENTRY TO  A
    6  THEATRE  OR  ANY  PLACE OF ENTERTAINMENT OR AMUSEMENT WHERE SUCH TICKETS
    7  ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC AT NO CHARGE. ANY VIOLATION OF THIS  SECTION
    8  SHALL BE A MISDEMEANOR PUNISHABLE BY A FINE OF ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS.
    9    S  2.  This act shall take effect immediately; provided, however, that
   10  the amendments to article 25 of title G of the arts and cultural affairs
   11  law made by section one of this act shall not affect the repeal of  such
   12  article and shall be deemed repealed therewith.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07110-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of certain tickets of admission to theatres, or places of amusement or entertainment
